titleInfo.title: Songwriters in the Center Ring at Vanderbilt Plaza

mods.abstract: Two color window card (green and red on light brown) announcing Songwriters in the Center Ring with M.C. Minnie Pearl and featuring Bobby Bare, Hillary Kanter, Hugh Prestwood, Jennifer Kimball, Jon Ims, Julie Gold, Kostas, Lee Roy Parnell, Pat Alger, Max D. Barnes, Phill McHugh, Ricky Skaggs, and Richard Leigh at the Vanderbilt Plaza on March 15. Poster features a woodcut of a tent and a city skyline.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
